summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be substantially implemented. The pencilSketchUtils.ts has been refactored with Sobel edge detection, hatching/cross-hatching pipeline across 5 stages. The UI theme has been updated with deep near-black backgrounds, gold/amber accents, dark card containers, and proper HILSA-ART branding across all required pages and components. No significant missing requirements are detected, though a few unrequested features were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Instagram, X/Twitter, Behance) added to Footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request for REQ-2 described the footer as having dark background, centered HILSA-ART branding with gold accent, grey navigation links, and copyright line â€” no social media icons were mentioned in the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Contact page added with validated form and social media cards
hallucinated_features.reason: A Contact page with a form and social media cards was implemented, but neither REQ-1 nor REQ-2 requested a Contact page. The build request only lists Header, Footer, GalleryView, Home, Results, and HowItWorks pages for REQ-2.

hallucinated_features.description: caffeine.ai attribution link added to Footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not request any caffeine.ai branding or attribution in the footer. This appears to be an addition not covered by the spec.
